page.title: 10EVENTS _ BORTH
page.content: Borth{Eisteddfod}is an annual event drawing competitors of a very high standard from all over Wales. The {Carnival,}a major attraction, holds competitions over a few weeks. These include a knock out competition, a raft race, a carnival procession and the re_enactment of the legend of Traeth Maelgwyn (P5), when the competitor who remains seated longest is crowned ruler of Cors Fochno. The local artists group from Aberystwyth holds an{art exhibition at the old church school every year. Various other entertainments held from time to time are:local quiz, St. Valentine's Dance, Guy Fawkes bonfire organised by the foot ball club,coffee mornings,and concerts for parents, senior citizens and friends by the school and other youth organisations. { }
